TextView.android:text: (1) When You run the game, the Game assumes a 4 letter word (no plurals and proper nouns). (2) Type your guess in the text box and click OK. (3) If there is a letter common to the word assumed by the computer and the word guessed, a 'Bull' is indicated, if the letters are in the same position in both the words. (4) If there is a letter common to both the words and if the letters are not in the same position in both the words, a 'Cow' is indicated. (5) Zero-in your guess with the help of the clue of number of 'Bulls' and 'Cows' and find out the word assumed by the computer. (6) No letters in a given word repeat. (7) Must be a 4 letter word.
